QUEEN OF BATTLE
SERIES ONE
1- -INFANTRY - PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE
the story of the infantry, its past, its present capabilities and a
glimpse into the future
2- -ALLIED STUDENT TRAINING PROGRAM
our Army lends a hand in training officers from allied nations,
and strengthens free world security
3- -ARMY AVIATION
the infantry takes to the air to gain greater mobility and more
adequate support
4- SPORTS IN THE ARMY
sports are fun. They foster teamwork, build stronger and better
adapted combat soldiers
5- -MEDAL OF HONOR
the story of this Nation’s highest award and how one American
earned the right to wear it
6- -RESERVE OFFICERS’ TRAINING CORPS
college and Army life become one for six weeks as students
attend ROTC summer camp prior to commissioning
7- THE ASSOCIATION OF THE UNITED STATES ARMY
teamwork is the key to success for any organization, and Army
teamwork gets a boost from the Association of the US Army
8- A CODE OF CONDUCT
contact with the enemy, or even capture calls for a large amount
of self-control. The CODE tells the soldier how
9- -TWO-THIRDS OF THE ARMY
the majority of the Army is made up of draftees and short-term
enlistees. This is their story
10- -MILITARY INTELLIGENCE
the winning combat soldier must know what he’s up against.
Military intelligence provides this information
11- -GOOD NEIGHBORS
better relations are achieved when the military and civilians join
hands in a common purpose
12— INFANTRY SCHOOL INSTRUCTION
like a student in college, infantrymen are taught the ways to cope
with what lies ahead. In the Army, this could be combat
13— THE OFFICER CANDIDATE
the making of an officer in one of the Army’s most intensive and
highly competitive training courses
